posts.text: Some songs are clocks that refuse numbers. Analog Myth is one of them.
drafts: Some songs are clocks that refuse numbers. Analog Myth is one of them.
I wrote this for anyone living off emotional time instead of calendar time.
If you can’t read clocks, maybe time is just a myth.

posts.text: Late again. Right on emotional schedule. #analogmyth
drafts: Late again. Right on emotional schedule. #analogmyth
Time is fake but this hook is real.
A short transmission from Analog Myth ⚡
I trust tape hiss more than perfect silence.

posts.text: I wrote Analog Myth after missing three appointments and somehow arriving at the right song.
drafts: I wrote Analog Myth after missing three appointments and somehow arriving at the right song.
The microwave blinking 12:00 gave me the first line.
When old hurts return at 2am, maybe time isn’t linear after all.
